titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation of his Majesties grace, favour, and pardon, to the inhabitants of his county of Glocester.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1625-1649.

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms at head of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, the third day of November, in the Eighteenth yeare of Our Reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
